titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to notify certain taxpayers of the eligibility requirements for the earned income credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/1/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide written notice of the requirements to claim the earned income tax credit and for filing amended tax returns to taxpayers who the Secretary deems might be eligible for the credit but who have not claimed it on their return.
